sub_topic: Prove that the symmetric difference of two sets is associative.
message_1: Let A = {1, 2, 3, 4} and B = {2, 3, 6, 7} be two sets. Find the symmetric difference of (A △ B) △ A and A △ (B △ A), and verify that they are equal, proving that the symmetric difference of two sets is associative.
